posts.post_content:
Really, REALLY reminds me of that 5-cost 2/5 with soulbound vigilance, [Spectral Gateguards](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spectral Gateguards)

Not too bad, but definitely never seeing constructed play.

posts.post_content: Why would anyone want to jump through hoops to play a card that isn't even that much better when the additional requirements are met? A 2/5 with vigilance for 3W is just about on cost, but needing a Gateland, while not particularly hard to achieve, is still a silly and unnecessary requirement on an already subpar card.

posts.post_content: He has Dimir flavour text because that guild still exists. It's not like Dimir, Orzhov, Simic, Gruul and Boros have no part in this block. Ravnica still has ten guilds, and I like cards that remind us of that. I'd also be glad to see references to these first five in Gatecrash.
